Woodcarver's Tools.Description: Woodcarver's tools allow you to craft intricate objects from wood, such as wooden tokens or arrows.

Skills.Arcana: Your expertise lends you additional insight when you examine wooden objects, such as figurines or arrows.
Skills.History: Your expertise lends you additional insight when you examine wooden objects, such as figurines or arrows.
Skills.Nature: Your knowledge of wooden objects gives you some added insight when you examine trees.
